name: claude-plugins-official
description: Directory of popular Claude Code extensions including development tools, productivity plugins, and MCP integrations

plugins.name: agent-sdk-dev
plugins.description: Development kit for working with the Claude Agent SDK

plugins.name: pr-review-toolkit
plugins.description: Comprehensive PR review agents specializing in comments, tests, error handling, type design, code quality, and code simplification

plugins.name: commit-commands
plugins.description: Commands for git commit workflows including commit, push, and PR creation

plugins.name: feature-dev
plugins.description: Comprehensive feature development workflow with specialized agents for codebase exploration, architecture design, and quality review

plugins.name: security-guidance
plugins.description: Security reminder hook that warns about potential security issues when editing files, including command injection, XSS, and unsafe code patterns

plugins.name: code-review
plugins.description: Automated code review for pull requests using multiple specialized agents with confidence-based scoring to filter false positives

plugins.name: explanatory-output-style
plugins.description: Adds educational insights about implementation choices and codebase patterns (mimics the deprecated Explanatory output style)

plugins.name: learning-output-style
plugins.description: Interactive learning mode that requests meaningful code contributions at decision points (mimics the unshipped Learning output style)

plugins.name: frontend-design
plugins.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.

plugins.name: ralph-wiggum
plugins.description: Interactive self-referential AI loops for iterative development. Claude works on the same task repeatedly, seeing its previous work, until completion.

plugins.name: hookify
plugins.description: Easily create custom hooks to prevent unwanted behaviors by analyzing conversation patterns or from explicit instructions. Define rules via simple markdown files.

plugins.name: plugin-dev
plugins.description: Comprehensive toolkit for developing Claude Code plugins. Includes 7 expert skills covering hooks, MCP integration, commands, agents, and best practices. AI-assisted plugin creation and validation.

plugins.name: greptile
plugins.description: AI-powered codebase search and understanding. Query your repositories using natural language to find relevant code, understand dependencies, and get contextual answers about your codebase architecture.

plugins.name: serena
plugins.description: Semantic code analysis MCP server providing intelligent code understanding, refactoring suggestions, and codebase navigation through language server protocol integration.

plugins.name: playwright
plugins.description: Browser automation and end-to-end testing MCP server by Microsoft. Enables Claude to interact with web pages, take screenshots, fill forms, click elements, and perform automated browser testing workflows.

plugins.name: github
plugins.description: Official GitHub MCP server for repository management. Create issues, manage pull requests, review code, search repositories, and interact with GitHub's full API directly from Claude Code.

plugins.name: supabase
plugins.description: Supabase MCP integration for database operations, authentication, storage, and real-time subscriptions. Manage your Supabase projects, run SQL queries, and interact with your backend directly.

plugins.name: atlassian
plugins.description: Connect to Atlassian products including Jira and Confluence. Search and create issues, access documentation, manage sprints, and integrate your development workflow with Atlassian's collaboration tools.

plugins.name: laravel-boost
plugins.description: Laravel development toolkit MCP server. Provides intelligent assistance for Laravel applications including Artisan commands, Eloquent queries, routing, migrations, and framework-specific code generation.

plugins.name: figma
plugins.description: Figma design platform integration. Access design files, extract component information, read design tokens, and translate designs into code. Bridge the gap between design and development workflows.

plugins.name: asana
plugins.description: Asana project management integration. Create and manage tasks, search projects, update assignments, track progress, and integrate your development workflow with Asana's work management platform.

plugins.name: linear
plugins.description: Linear issue tracking integration. Create issues, manage projects, update statuses, search across workspaces, and streamline your software development workflow with Linear's modern issue tracker.

plugins.name: Notion
plugins.description: Notion workspace integration. Search pages, create and update documents, manage databases, and access your team's knowledge base directly from Claude Code for seamless documentation workflows.

plugins.name: gitlab
plugins.description: GitLab DevOps platform integration. Manage repositories, merge requests, CI/CD pipelines, issues, and wikis. Full access to GitLab's comprehensive DevOps lifecycle tools.

plugins.name: sentry
plugins.description: Sentry error monitoring integration. Access error reports, analyze stack traces, search issues by fingerprint, and debug production errors directly from your development environment.

plugins.name: slack
plugins.description: Slack workspace integration. Search messages, access channels, read threads, and stay connected with your team's communications while coding. Find relevant discussions and context quickly.

plugins.name: vercel
plugins.description: Vercel deployment platform integration. Manage deployments, check build status, access logs, configure domains, and control your frontend infrastructure directly from Claude Code.

plugins.name: firebase
plugins.description: Google Firebase MCP integration. Manage Firestore databases, authentication, cloud functions, hosting, and storage. Build and manage your Firebase backend directly from your development workflow.

plugins.name: context7
plugins.description: Upstash Context7 MCP server for up-to-date documentation lookup. Pull version-specific documentation and code examples directly from source repositories into your LLM context.
